code: @Manual{,   title = {Explore: Exhaustive Procedure for LOgic-Rule Extraction},   author = {Aniek F Markus},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.2.0},   url = {https://cbarbozaerasmus.github.io/Explore/}, }

title: Exhaustive Procedure for LOgic-Rule Extraction
text: Functions find short accurate decision rule disjunctive normal form using Exhaustive Procedure LOgic-Rule Extraction (EXPLORE) algorithm. application performs exhaustive search Boolean Normal Form decision rules.

title: Exhaustive Procedure for LOgic-Rule Extraction
text: can install latest version EXPLORE like : Additional instructions: added.

title: Exhaustive Procedure for LOgic-Rule Extraction
text: Load data: Fit model defaults /input parameters: Predict: Additional documentation includes: - Vignette code examples combination PLP: added - Package manual: added
code: library(Explore) library(farff) data <- farff::readARFF(system.file("examples/iris.arff", package = "Explore")) output_path <- file.path(getwd(), "output//") model <- Explore::trainExplore(output_path = output_path,                                 file_name = "iris",                                 train_data = data,                                 ClassFeature = "'class'",                                 PositiveClass = '"Iris-versicolor"') prediction <- Explore::predictExplore(model, test_data = data)

title: Exhaustive Procedure for LOgic-Rule Extraction
